submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d = [0] * (k + 2)
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a = min(nums[i], nums[n - 1- i])
            b = max(nums[i], nums[n - 1- i])
            mx = max(k - a, b) + 1
            d[mx] += 1
            d[0] += 1
            d[b - a] -= 1
            d[b - a + 1] += 1
        s = 0
        ans = inf
        for i in range(k + 1):
            s += d[i]
            ans = min(ans, s)
        return ans
